title: Dashboard Project
description: Build a multi-page dashboard application using real-world patterns

intro.title: From App to System
intro.story: You are now building something that looks like a real company product.
intro.preview: Multiple pages, shared layout, reusable components.

concept.title: Project Overview
concept.content:
You will build a **Dashboard Application**.

Features:
- Sidebar navigation
- Multiple pages
- Shared layout
- Data-driven UI

concept2.title: Pages in the Dashboard
concept2.content:
- Login (mock)
- Dashboard Home
- Users List
- User Details
- Settings

architecture.title: Folder Structure
architecture.content:
src/
- components/
- pages/
- layouts/
- services/
- hooks/
- utils/

concept3.title: Layout Pattern
concept3.content:
Dashboard apps reuse the same layout.

Sidebar and header stay the same.
Only page content changes.

positive.title: Dashboard Layout
positive.explanation: Outlet renders the active page inside the layout.

concept4.title: Routing Strategy
concept4.content:
Use nested routes.

DashboardLayout wraps all dashboard pages.
Each page becomes a child route.

options.explanation: Without a layout, UI is replaced instead of shared.

challenge.title: Users Page
challenge.description: Display list of users and navigate to details page.
challenge.solution: Use useEffect for fetching and useParams for user id
